snippet.title: 9th Dawn III gameplay premiere - Introduction to Creature Raising
snippet.description:
This is a video demonstration for the Creature Raising system in 9th Dawn III. Creature Raising is entirely optional, but if you want to collect monsters to help you fight then this video is for you! It will teach you how to capture, manage, feed and eventually morph your creatures into powerful beasts!
There is also a camel teaser near the end ;) 
9th Dawn III is near the end of development and a release date should be within 2020, for all major platforms.
Please follow www.facebook.com/valorware for updates!
Voice acting by my friend @Rurik_Seven
